website_summaries.verdict: A cheaper alternative to the Protone.
pros: People with larger heads find that the large size fits perfectly, and the adjustable band on the inside is a great feature
The eye garage holds your sunglasses securely when you aren't using them, and the lightweight design of this helmet make it one of the more comfortable options
cons: The unusual style is not for everyone, and the large colored stickers may peel off over time

customer_reviews.title: 100% POC Knockoff
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a real POC helmet. The helmet received is not the helmet in the photo. It's covered in cheap stickers peeling up and crooked. The clips are not the same. Do your self a favor and save the $200+ - go to REI or order from POC direct.
customer_reviews.author: bailey

customer_reviews.title: Best helmet I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Quite simply one of the best helmets on the market. Design and engineering is light years of just recent models. I’ve been riding with a Kask Mojito for the past year and this POC is so far past the Kask in fit and light weigh, it makes it look like a helmet from the 80’s. Size is perfect, and the ventilation is superior to anything I’ve used. The cost is nothing for something so important and so amazingly well designed. If you ride a lot of miles, get one. You will not be disappointed. Update, made a second purchase!
customer_reviews.author: apice

customer_reviews.title: The chin strap comes loose way too easily.
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this helmet—it's light, it's comfortable, it does seem to run cooler than my last Giro Saros... but it has a fatal flaw. The chin strap won't stay tight. I find I'm having to tighten it over and over again on rides. This is just plain unsafe and not something that should be happening with a $200 helmet. The male buckle that serves as the strap adjustment is just too loose for the thin nylon strap to get a firm friction lock.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: The White is not the white Amazon has pictured....
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and ok for comfort. People said the helmet ran larger but I found it to be the opposite. I typically wear a Medium helmet and this one feels snug. My biggest frustration is the helmet they show for the white option (which I like a lot) is NOT how it actually looks. The one I received is completely white. Had I known this I would’ve gone with another color. Would be nice if Amazon posted correct sample images of the items they sell...
customer_reviews.author: OutdoorArtist

customer_reviews.title: SUPERB
customer_reviews.text: Man I love poc. This helmet is comfy and light. I love the styling of it too, I'm sure some might not like it but I do. I bought this because I loved my mtb tectal version so I decided to give this one a try for my new road bike and its a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Superb design. Amazing helmet worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet and definitely worth the price tag. Fits great, has plenty of adjustment options, and barely feels like a helmet on your head. Since I have a more oval shaped head, I chose this one since its been reviewed to fit farther down towards ones ears. This is definitely true and it doesn't give me the "mushroom top" look I had with my old Giro Phase. One other thing that is great are the ear straps - the design makes it so that you never have the straps touching or rubbing your ears. Had a problem with this with my old helmet on 4 day bike trip.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: I opened it and tried it on the fit was remarkably comfortable, I have been using a Smith helmet for ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was very long and I was trying to cancel as I had ordered for a trip to Europe, it arrived two days before our travel date, I opened it and tried it on the fit was remarkably comfortable, I have been using a Smith helmet for the last year and was very happy, this is by far the lightest and best fitting most comfortable i have ever worn, A+++++++++
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Truly the best helmet I have ever worn! Unfortunately the clasp must be defective as it continually comes loose as I ride and I have to tighten it. I have always worn a medium in my Giro helmets but this medium is slightly large. I almost think I could have used a smal. Regardless, love the high visibility pink; it's a beautiful color and shipment was seamless.
customer_reviews.author: Swift Pen

customer_reviews.title: Extremely dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very dissappointed that this helmet was delivered without a box. At just under $200 i would have expected it to be in original packaging. It actually looks like it has been worn before. Unfortunately i boarded a plane for New Zealand before i opened it otherwise i would have sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Tony coggan

customer_reviews.title: Love my Pink POC
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is awesome! It's very easy for others to see. This is my second POC. The helmet is the most comfortable helmet I've worn. It's very easy to adjust for a proper fit. And if had the MIPS technology. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CaliGal57

customer_reviews.title: IF you like the look, it's an excellent helmet
customer_reviews.text: The look can be a bit polarizing - obviously, I'm a fan. That said... Super light, great coverage, great ventilation, and a compact design - perfection. Super comfy (insanely light/thin) webbing. Historically I've been a huge fan of "Specialized" helmets - the fit on this is identical, which for me is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: JColletti

customer_reviews.title: Buy this cycling Helmet. Top shelf.
customer_reviews.text: Light, fits well and looks to me like it would offer superior protection. Ventilation is first rate.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce T. Lowell

customer_reviews.title: Octal X
customer_reviews.text: The Image of the black helmet sells a "Octal X" POC Helmet and I received a Octal. The Octal X is + $50 more expensive Total fraud be careful and don't trust the images.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top notch protection that looks cool
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty happy with this helmet. It fits as expected, no surprizes: Medium size fit my medium head perfectly. Quality, it’s light but well made. It comes in colors that are fresh, not just boring black.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Lee

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: Was wayyyyy too large, despite measuring and sizing correctly. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Very light and airy.
customer_reviews.text: Good helmet, it is very light and airy. Riding and I don't notice I have the helmet one.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J Sherrod

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic helmet
customer_reviews.text: I've been riding for 40 years and this is by far the best helmet I've ever worn. Light weight, great fit and fantastic ventilation. Also the neon orange makes me very visible. Couldn't be more pleased with this helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Jrm

customer_reviews.title: Best helmet
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, it is equivalent to riding with no helmet that’s how light and comfortable it is. I have never worn a helmet my whole life and tried to find one I like for so long. This is the one A+++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet! I Like the look and the fit. I haven't crashed on my head yet so I can't attest to the durability. I do wish the clasp was a little more advanced. Lazer has some pretty cool ones.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent brand, excellent helmet. Easy to clean and comes with new interior pads in case you sweat excessively.
customer_reviews.author: GracieH70

customer_reviews.title: Best Helmet Evah!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this helmet. So comfortable and great ventillation. Super easy to adjust the straps too. I used to get really bad cramping in my neck and shoulders with my old Giro helmet if I was in the saddle more than a couple of hours. I completed a 150 mile, two day cycling event with my new POC and didn't have any issues at all. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: sandy g

customer_reviews.title: Color faded immediately
customer_reviews.text: Was stoked for such a great deal on this Helmet. Sadly it s faded immediately and has a dull color after 3 months. Tried to contact POC Sports customer service but no response. Extremely disappointed that a company with such a good reputation in cycling gear would have such a poor quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Mostly I like the lightness of it and the fit was like perfectComfort. I could hardly tail I had it on
customer_reviews.author: pete torbergson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Liked: It fits well, is very light, looks good Disliked: Nothing so far
customer_reviews.author: pg

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS HELMET!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet. this thing makes me want to wear it every time I ride. Comfortable, very airy, great looking helmet.
customer_reviews.author: UncleWolf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best road helmet in the market. It's lighter than the Kask Protone.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice and comfortable helmet. Also very fashionable.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Poc bicycle helmetis well designed and well made with lots of ventilation but tends to fit loosely- would recomend down sizing
customer_reviews.text: Good helmet- would recomend down sizing somewhat- other wise it may fit loosely
customer_reviews.author: Crayton Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: POC Octal Raceday
customer_reviews.text: very light; easily adjustable; best venting I've ever experienced; seller was prompt and easy to deal with
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Eskridge

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 IGN
customer_reviews.text: One of my best cycling purchases to date. Love the fitting on this helmet and is really well ventilated. Have no problems so far, the eye garage is perfect with my Oakley Jawbreakers. Now I can fit in with all the fancy Rapha guys wearing this helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Kalvin

customer_reviews.title: Favorite helmet
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the helmets I’ve owned, this is the most comfortable one yet! Super light and I love the style
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: which can easily be peeled off
customer_reviews.text: This is my first POC helmet, and I had high hopes after hearing so much about them over the years. Unfortunately I'm let down by the quality. The biggest example of this is the helmet color is simply two large stickers, which can easily be peeled off.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Helmet, very light
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Helmet, very light, beautiful and confortable. The real color is different from these pictures, it is a little bit darker
customer_reviews.author: Simons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, light weight and like the looks. Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: POC POC!
customer_reviews.text: Well, full disclosure, I only wear this part of the time. Weekends with lower traffic I leave it at home, but when I ride during the week, this is the best- screw all the streamlined nonsense- this helmet breathes- air wafting over your sweaty scalp- it's the point, right? A little expensive, but to my well ventilated mind, worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Alan G. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the helmet, it's very light, looks good, and has excellent air flow
customer_reviews.author: jonathan tyghter

customer_reviews.title: Best helmet I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Great fit. Awesome styling. It doesn't get any better.
customer_reviews.author: Michael N.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS HELMET
customer_reviews.text: Bough this Poc helmet last month and in a MT bike race crashed head first into a bolder! helmet cracked, but saved my head, LOVE THIS HELMET, just recieved my new one.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Pinckard

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is terrible. My POC crane is 10 times more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable across the top of the head. For this price, there should be padding there, as there is on earlier POC helmets. Comfort is terrible. My POC crane is 10 times more comfortable. I was a believer in POC helmets, not anymore. Skip it.
customer_reviews.author: John S

product_meta.title: POC, Octal, Helmet for Road Biking
product_meta.description: The award-winning Octal helmet has been engineered to take the next step in road bike helmet safety and offers optimal ventilation and comfort and weighs less than 200 grams (size M, CE-version). To further improve safety, the Octal provides more coverage and additional protection for the temples and back of the head and the EPS liner is strategically thicker in the most exposed areas. The fully wrapped unibody shell construction functions as a monocoque and enhances the safety properties and construction integrity of the helmet, while maintaining a low weight. POC has approached ventilation in a unique way and instead of using many small vents, Octal has fewer, but larger ventilation slots. This ventilation design allows more air to flow through the helmet, which also results in improved aerodynamic performance. The lightweight size adjustment system ensures a comfortable and secure fit while the Coolbest padding helps reduce the temperature at the interface between the helmet and head.
feature_bullets: High performance EPS liner, optimized in density
Generously ventilated, using POC's unique ventilation design
